text.section: A county may establish a seasonal farmer's market producer sampling license to be required for a producer of a farm product to prepare and offer samples of the farm product for human consumption at a farmer's market or at a public festival or event.
A seasonal farmer's market producer sampling licensee shall use the license only to offer samples of a farm product that has been produced by the licensee.

A county issuing a seasonal farmer's market producer sampling license shall adopt an ordinance that:
Sets the fee for the license;
Provides for the enforcement of provisions of law under which the license is issued; and
Provides penalties for violations of provisions of law under which the license is issued.
